entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter, updates #56629
  • Perf improvement: mvc #56628
  • InvalidOperationException: EditForm requires either a Model parameter, or an EditContext parameter ... - Caused by Using a Poco in different assembly that has public fields instead of auto-properties #56627
  • SignInManager.ValidateTwoFactorSecurityStampAsync is incorrectly passing userName to FindByIdAsync #56625
  • Question: How to detect whether the current app is a normal ASP.NET Core application or a Blazor app? #56633
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #56624
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_dapper, single_query #56623
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef #56622
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes, fortunes_dapper #56621
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json, mvc #56620
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes, multiple_queries #56619

Closed

  • EditForm that is placed on an interactive server page does not trigger submit handler. #56634
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #56611
  • Authentication for static files || OpenIDConnect || BlazoreServer App || Dotnetcore 8 #55057
  • Stop injecting "_framework/aspnetcore-browser-refresh.js" into the body of every generated web page of an asp.net core app. #55734
  • User is authenticated false, when using multiple cookie authentications #56540
  • This is a dup of https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/issues/23195 which was closed due to inactivity. It does provide a workaround though #56337
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #56612
  • Add named pipes methods to Kestrel configuration loader #56565
  • Add named pipes methods to Kestrel configuration loader #54314
  • Request to Add System.Range Extension Support #56618
  • OpenAPI Throws `System.ArgumentNullException` Inside Docker #56309

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Bundle runtime .MSI's instead of .exe's #56632
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Chain runtime .Msi's instead of .Exe's in hosting bundle #56631
    area-infrastructure
  • Removing unsafe parts of Decode method in QueryStringEnumerable #56630
    community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • Add named pipes methods to Kestrel configuration loader #56563
    area-networking, 9.0-preview7
  • Add test for the order of activity and metrics with HTTP requests #56592
    area-hosting, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a7f443b` to `1d17ea1` #56232
    area-infrastructure
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.7.24351.1 #56546
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/8.0] Chain runtime .Msi's instead of .Exe's in hosting bundle #56459
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Perf: ReasonPhrases as Array instead of Dictionary #56304
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Use Ascii.ToUtf16 in StringUtilities #56578
    area-networking
  • Optimize RouteTableFactory.DetectAmbiguous routes #56415
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    area-networking
  • Add disable HTTP metrics endpoint metadata #56036
    area-hosting
  • Use Convert.ToHexStringLower() #56235
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security, 9.0-preview7
  • Remove LINQ usage from OpenAPI comparers #56599
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Add CreateNamedPipeServerStream to named pipes options #56567
    area-networking
  • Do not close connection for http1.0 when client request connection keep-alive #56558
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Support IAsyncEnumerable<T> and ChannelReader<T> with ValueTypes in SignalR native AOT #56583
    area-signalr
